page.title: 01THE ELMSTEAD AREA
page.content: Our area covers{Elmstead,Burnt {Heath,Crockleford Heath}and parts of {Gt.Bromley}and{Ardleigh.}It is predominantly a{farming}area,but unusually for this part of{Essex,}it is not only{arable,}there are{orchards and{nurseries;}because of this many {hedges}remain and the area is rich in {woodland.}Houses are scattered, apart from the dwellings in{Burnt Heath}- these are mainly occupied by retired people or commuters. The houses are not modern, some are old,but many have undergone alterations, e.g.extensions and windows.There are few amenities, there is no mains drainage or gas. The {New By-Pass}has had a considerable effect on the farms as a number have been divided into 2,and one has been divided into 4. Bridges have been built to facilitate the moving of agricultural machinery.
